bibl.title: An Egyptian Bas-Relief of the Roman Period.
bibl.note: Bought at Cairo in 1897. Sandstone, H. 46 cm. Shrine plaque, with the figures of Atum-Montu and the Bull Bukhis. Hermonthis, Roman period.
bibl.seg: Drioton Étienne, An Egyptian Bas-Relief of the Roman Period.
Baroda State Museum Bulletin 2 (1944-1945) pp. 45-47, 2 figg.
Bought at Cairo in 1897. Sandstone, H. 46 cm. Shrine plaque, with the figures of Atum-Montu and the Bull Bukhis. Hermonthis, Roman period.
